turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Could you order me a coffee from Starbucks?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Which location did you want?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The one on Military Dr.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok did you want anything else

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes can you order me a pizza from Pizza Hut?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure what size do you want?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: 2 large pizzas with pepperoni on both

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Do you want any additional toppings?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes actually add some pineapples

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Pineapples it is. Did you want ranch on the side

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Sure some ranch and also parmesan cheese and chili flakes

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok did you want any wings

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Sure order me the garlic parmesan with blue cheese dressing

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok and anything to drink?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Coke is fine.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Let me check. They only have Pepsi.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No get me Mountain Dew instead.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No that's it, that's enough.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok they said they can send you a receipt via text

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That's perfect.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok everything's confirmed, the pizza will be ready for pickup in about 25 minutes

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Ok thanks for your help.

items.name: ranch and also parmesan cheese and chili flakes
Ok everything's confirmed, the pizza will be ready for pickup in about 25 minutes
